Pixelshot: Capture Webpages Exactly As You See Them

Capture Full Page and Visible Area screenshots of webpages with Pixelshot. Pixelshot is a free, lightweight Chrome extension that delivers pixel-perfect captures of entire webpages (full page) or just the visible area, free from bloat, ads, or unnecessary permissions.

With Pixelshot, you can:

✓ Capture screenshots with Precision: Pixelshot mirrors your screen exactly, including scrollable content, to capture every detail of the webpage in stunning clarity.
✓ Flexible Capture Options: Choose between capturing the full page or just the visible area, giving you the freedom to grab precisely what you need.
✓ High-quality PNG screenshots: Capture crisp, detailed screenshots in the universally compatible PNG format, optimized for clarity and precision.
✓ Easy to use: Designed for simplicity, capture screenshots in a single click without navigating through complex settings.
✓ Optimized Performance: Pixelshot is a lightweight and resource-friendly extension to capture screenshots quickly using the native Chrome debugger.
✓ Privacy-focused: Your screenshots are stored locally on your computer and never uploaded to any servers, ensuring complete privacy.

Pixelshot is Ideal for:

★ Effortless Sharing: Capture and share screenshots of articles, tutorials, news, recipes, or interesting visuals you find online with ease.
★ Convenient Saving: Keep important webpage information at your fingertips for reference, research, or offline viewing.
★ Creating presentations and reports: Incorporate high-quality screenshots into documents and presentations for clear and impactful communication.
★ Bug reporting and troubleshooting: Provide visual evidence of website issues to support teams for quick resolution.

Pixelshot Features:

▸ Capture full-page screenshots, including all scrollable content.
▸ Capture screenshots of your current viewport area.
▸ Easily download screenshots in PNG format.

Pixelshot is completely free, developed with a focus on user experience and privacy. Install Pixelshot today and and experience a seamless way to capture webpages exactly as you see them!
